description.excerpt: Encoder is defined as classification model for 102 categories. After training, encoder is assumed to make good feature vectors for images.
The model contains same structure for the encoder with 1. The decoder part is added for generating ab(NOT RGB) colors.
L1 loss is added to GAN loss. This is for training stability, also the right color.

installation.excerpt:
you can download at https://www.kaggle.com/c/oxford-102-flower-pytorch/data
If you are interested, you can try another dataset. However, you should change models(ex. change encoder structure for 102 categories to other). we have 3 sequential steps to train each modules instead of traning the whole model at one step.

invocation.excerpt: Link the dataset to use for training, validation, test.
